channel.title: Latest site design =]
channel.description:
Kay, this time I worked harder then my last one, so im hoping you will like this ;D; also i had a problem getting the colors in the side-nav-bar though (and yes i use gimp... I can't afford photoshop :(, not rich like you guys). So heres the final outcome ;):
[IMG]http://i260.photobucket.com/albums/ii3/Ixl_photos/Preview.png[/img]

item.title: Latest site design =]
item.dc:creator: @fluffymuff1n fluffymuff1n
item.description:
@fluffymuff1n wrote:

[quote=“Holic, post:26, topic:180873”][quote author=fluffymuff1n link=topic=242233.msg2054302#msg2054302 date=1203066189]
your stupidty level has gone up one level!
[/quote]
Are you sure it was Ixl that gained a level?

Having the full image at once would be easier. You throw it in Image Ready, slice and export, stolen.

I honestly don’t see why you have a problem with this template/thread.

-Holic[/quote]
no your has, but im just gonna ignore this thread, and if someone even stole the pic with no anti leech, you “copyrighted” it so it should be safe, and someone did steal your template, tell your parents to call a lawyer, and looky there, you just made $10,000 from suing.

and no, it will be easier to steal it straight off the web, so stfu you don’t know anything @ Holic, C+P on the web, and .psds sometimes if you can find the directory.

Read full topic

item.title: Latest site design =]
item.dc:creator: @Ixl_Adds_Ixl Ixl Adds Ixl
item.description:
@Ixl_Adds_Ixl wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Who uses photoshop anyway? Real men use GIMP! ;D

lol nice one EDIT: lol i lol at that comment every time i think of it[quote=“Holic, post:15, topic:180873”][quote author=fluffymuff1n link=topic=242233.msg2052304#msg2052304 date=1202973718]
why would i leech a picture with gay text and crud everywhere…? just get rid of the anti leech
[/quote]
No. Does it really matter if he put it on there? He likes his work and doesn’t want to risk it being taken. You might think it sounds silly, but say he’s not releasing the template but is using it and someone comes along and takes it. That really sucks because you spent time making it so it’s not fun.

It’s not bad, not a fan of the rounded navbar. Has to be done perfect for me to like rounded edges. I would also maybe reduce the size of it, same with the news header.
Other then that it shouldn’t be that bad of template.

-Holic[/quote]
exactly, and from what i’ve experienced people will do what you rarely do not expect them to do. its just stupidity. Like what ‘fluffymuff1n’ said, he could be lying cuz words dont mean anything. In life there are 2 inner secrets: the “mouth” and the “brain”, so i don’t care what people claim about my template. Im just a beginner who worked hard as hell on this design and don’t wanna risk it to people who could just take it in a second (yes, like this for ex: right click > download image. - see what i mean? just 2 clicks and your done). None of you experienced designers wont because you can design your own template, but people do what you don’t exspect like how those moparscape noobs use runescapes template.

hahahaha heres my example of why i protect my template here:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

see wtf i mean huh? people do stupid sht that you possibly wouldn’t expect!

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:12, topic:180873”][quote author=JV link=topic=242233.msg2048875#msg2048875 date=1202832247]

Also, high five for not leeching photoshop.
Earn the money, and you’ll enjoy using it alot more!

[/quote]

He probably wont…[/quote]

how do i get photoshop for free anyways?

Read full topic

item.title: Latest site design =]
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

fluffymuff1n:

why would i leech a picture with gay text and crud everywhere…? just get rid of the anti leech

No. Does it really matter if he put it on there? He likes his work and doesn’t want to risk it being taken. You might think it sounds silly, but say he’s not releasing the template but is using it and someone comes along and takes it. That really sucks because you spent time making it so it’s not fun.

It’s not bad, not a fan of the rounded navbar. Has to be done perfect for me to like rounded edges. I would also maybe reduce the size of it, same with the news header.
Other then that it shouldn’t be that bad of template.

-Holic

Read full topic
